name: Diplomatic Corps Institute
membership:
UN (Department of Economic and Social Affairs)

goal: Promotion of diplomacy and dialogue to prevent social unrest, particularly in developing nations. Scholarships for trainee diplomats and formation courses for serving diplomats.
